duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop novel process flows for critical modules, create structural and electrical specifications, and design rules for new process flows.
Analyze results using statistical analysis software, and apply findings to enhance yield (DOE).
Work cross-functionally with multiple groups to identify and resolve issues, summarize complex problems, and drive consensus across teams.
Define and achieve sub-milestones for projects within the larger program timelines, and collaborate with Manufacturing for technology transfer.
Understand mainstream memory technologies and device physics, and integrate process flows with Design, Product Engineering, and other supporting teams.
Summarize complex problems, develop actions to address them, and build consensus across teams to drive for solutions.

education_certification.credential: MS or PhD in Electrical Engineering, Physics, or a related technical field
